name: Delver's Die
description:
You are the Delver and you are on the run! Use your trusty magical dice to escape the cave! But careful, not every magic imbued into the dice is beneficial!

How to play:
Press E to cast the dice!
Press A/D to move left/right!
Press Space to jump!
Press W/S to look up and down!
